title: UNIVERSITE DE PARIS SORBONNE - varsity style font ID
content:
Anybody familiar with some digital versions of this vasity style lettering font that is similar?

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420041008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_fullxfull_6021.305198229.jpg)

comments.content:
Yearbook Outline seems to be a decent match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/Yearbook%20Outline/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420041008/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Yearbook%20Outline/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/Yearbook%20Outline/fonts/")
